channel.title: About reel2bits
channel.description:
[reel2bits](https://reel2bits.org/) is a self-hosted Soundtracks and Podcasts sharing, with ActivityPub federation.
The website is located at https://reel2bits.org/ and the source code on https://github.com/reel2bits/reel2bits
